EmailTemplate.name: Spoke with Sharepost/Final steps before activation (1363812341.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Spoke with Sharepost/Final steps before activation (1363812341.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Erik, I wanted to let you know I spoke with Ryan at Sharepost and he is going to sign our agreement and SOW and send it over to me. I will send you the SOW for approval and then fully execute the agreements. There are two more action items that I need taken care of before you are activated. The first is for me to create a quick net cash estimate for you to show what your billings will look like going through MBO for this project. The only information I will need for this is the bill rate you will be charging, if it is hourly/daily/by the job and the number of hours/days/jobs you will be doing per month. I also need to know whether you file as married or single and how many withholding allowances you take for tax purposes. The final step is described below, which is a quick enrollment in the MBO Access system which is described below: You’re one step away from being officially enrolled with MBO Partners! As part of your registration process with us, we’d like to invite you to become part of an exclusive, invitation-only, online community comprised of our vast network of Independent Consultants, just like you. Welcome to MBO Access!
With MBO Access you will be able to: - Network – Connect with fellow MBO Associates who share similar skills, great networks, and industry expertise that may lead to new business opportunities for you. - Discover – Access information about the many organizations that are already using MBO Partners to engage their Independent Contractors and other small services providers. - Share – Post projects to the community to help other Associates learn about new opportunities or simply post your availability to determine if anyone has an interest in learning more about what you do. Share articles that interest you, and start discussions with other Associates. - Thrive – Take advantage of the exclusive arrangements we’ve negotiated with organizations that provide services to Independent Consultants and small businesses. These include discounts on business development tools, professional development skills training programs, office supplies, co-working facilities, and travel, just to name a few. So, on to the good stuff…let’s get you set up! Please view this 3 minute video tutorial <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/spages/acctutorial/acctutorial.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCflUXuUhz%2FPmXAqHiizjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to help you get started. Then, log into your account, click on your name in the upper right hand corner of the page, and build up your profile so others can find and connect with you. Upon completion of your profile, please find and connect with me - you will then be officially enrolled with us!Your username for MBO Access will be the same as your MBO Business Center, and the very first time you login, you will need to click “Forgot your password,” to generate a password for you.Click here to login to MBO Access today! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://access.mbopartners.com/login.jspa?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCflUXuUhz%2FPmXAqHiizjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>I look forward to discussing the site with you, and welcome any feedback. Let me know if you have any additional questions as well! Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
